name: Hops (clementine803)
description:
Hops is a tale about frogs and their adventures in the quest of reclaiming their home from predators and other creatures.

Features (in development)

‣  Choose from 4 playable frog characters.

‣  Collect mushrooms and other pickups.

‣  Battle animal foes and predators.

‣  Non-tile based, free movement.

Meet IQ Dropbox, the team who worked on the game

Game Submission for  Mini Jam 106: Frogs²
